headline: MPM CORPORATION SP2400
categories.lvl1: Semiconductor Manufacturing Equipment > Semiconductor / Hybrid Assembly Equipment
categories.lvl2: Semiconductor Manufacturing Equipment  >  Semiconductor / Hybrid Assembly Equipment > Screen Printers
specstable:
Manufacturer MPM
Model SP2400
Description Screen Printer With Manual Vision System
Accessories Manual vision system assures precise alignment of board to stencil
Provides for fewer defects and higher yields.
Other Information System specifications:
Print area: 20" x 20" max
Frame size: 29" x 29" OD.
Board carriage
  • Registration repeatability: ±0.0005"
  • Board size: 21" x 21"
  • X Y Adjustment: ±0.500"
  • Rotary adjustment: ±10°
    Squeegee head
  • Print stroke adjustment: 1" to 23"
  • Squeegee speed: 0 to 12" per second
  • Squeegee pressure: 5 to 60 lbs.
  • Squeegee angle of attack adjustment: ±5°
  • Squeegee holder: 21" with 0.375 square blade
  • Squeegee flood blade, seperate height and level adjustment
    Motor drive: 1' range
    Vacuum work holder
    Manual vision system
  • Two camera assemblies
  • Video splitter
  • Work lamp
  • Monitor
Power Requirements 115 V 15.0 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Condition Excellent
Exterior Dimensions
Width 32.000 in (81.3 cm)
Depth 81.000 in (205.7 cm)
Height 59.000 in (149.9 cm)
